contents:
强行听了一遍这个英语，还是有个别词听不懂。有没有牛人能帮我补全？

Two. All the police. This passport belongs to *** of Nigeria. In language of international (parties), not any country has the right to seize the international passport ***.


If you want to do your policy for 14 days, shut down everybody. Not to discriminate. Everybody should sit at home, everybody including Chinese, including Nigerian, including everybody, including you, as a director. Everybody should stay at home. That is the *** Nigeria did. No, no one. Nigeria shut everything down. Nobody move.


You'll be popular. No problem. You’ll be popular too. I’m a diplomatic agent. In language of Vienna convention of 1963, the consular has the right to protect his nationality(nationals). What we are going to do tonight is to protect all our Nigerian nationality(nationals). They are not a criminal(s). They are not (anything). Why are you arresting them? This is the thing I want to know.
